name: MysteryForest
description:
You are lost in a forest and try to find the exit.

(The game is endless so dont try to finish it, its just a game where you try to get to a high level)

health bar is bugged so dont care too much about it. The damage you get is correct.

Controls:

w/a/s/d move

thats all.. just run into the exit to get to the next level. ( a hole with a ladder)
